utterances.text: Hi. I really like to eat barbecue. I think they really like barbecue, But I don't know why. I just only know Vietnamese like barbecue because it is the Opportunity for people to cook together, prepare for the meal together, and they have time to talk. Yeah.
I, sometimes we will have barbecue together. Well, I don't really, remember about my childhood, but, from a time that I have memory, I did, have
